text: Loveless is the second studio album by Irish band My Bloody Valentine. It was released on November 4, 1991. Most critics said it is the best shoegaze album of all time. In 1999, Pitchfork said Loveless was the best album of the 1990s.DiCrescenzo, Brent. "Top 100 Albums of the 1990s: Loveless". Pitchfork. Retrieved on 7 July 2007. My Bloody Valentine made a concert tour in Europe after the album was released. ==Track listing== == References == === Bibliography === * * * * Category:1991 albums Category:Rock albums
title: Loveless (album)
